title: The metabolomics analysis of cecal contents elucidates significant metabolites involved in the therapeutic effects of total flavonoids derived from Sonchus arvensis L. in male C57BL/6 mice with ulcerative colitis
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Naidan Chang, Wei wei, Shihe Wang, Shenghua Hou, Yilei Sui, Taoyang, Jing He, Yachao Ren, Guoyou Chen, Chunlei Bu
